sentence: Opened the package & instant migraine.
I cannot believe the stench.

I have purchased other packages that did not smell at all so I do not know if these were a damaged shipment or damaged during packaging or what, but the minute I opened the Amazon package I smelled it before I even opened the Terra Tattoos package.
Then I find that the pink inks from the back have smeared all over the fronts of the tattoos.

Yes, you eventually take the clear part off to apply the tattoo, but I always lay it down with the clear covering first to line it up & I didn‚Äôt want to risk the pink ink transferring to my art projects so it‚Äôs going back.
I‚Äôll update the review when Amazon sends my replacement.
I‚Äôm upset because now my resin is here & I don‚Äôt have the tattoos to do my project, but I‚Äôm more mad about the fact that I have a massive migraine because of the gasoline fumes that lingered.

I believe they arrived a week ago, but I didn‚Äôt check the tattoos then as I didn‚Äôt have resin & the smell of gasoline is just as string toast when I opened them to check them as it was last week when I forgot to start the return.
I‚Äôve been sick or I would have done it already.
I really hope the replacement tattoos are okay.
These have massive gaps at pump nozzle.
Tops the list for worst purchase.
Tried these for alcohol inks.
My mistake was not checking that every bottle would spray before filling them.
They both sprayed so I proceeded.
There is a gap where the pump is so if you shake your ink up and down it literally comes out the top which is why these are such a mess and if you knock it over the ink escapes.
Luckily I worked over my sink or the mess would have been worse, but I‚Äôm still wearing  a lot of ink days later.
These were a debacle start to finish.
I should have checked the bottles better before putting my ink in.
1/4 work okay, but will still spill ink if knocked over or shaken.
1/4 spray, but the spray is like a diagonal slash pattern not a nice round spray pattern  1/2 won‚Äôt spray at all.
Literally worst amazon purchase ever & now my inks are trapped in an item I need to return!!!

Her entire family including her 4 siblings & mom & dad love doing these.

It‚Äôs a complete waste of money, but luckily Amazon refunded me.

Mine wouldn‚Äôt close correctly so I sent it back.
It‚Äôs pretty and useful, but expect it to close properly.
Unbottled disappointment I don't often leave negative feedback about products - it really has to be a pretty poorly made product for that to happen.
Unfortunately, these bottles are super leaky, even with the rollerball tightly secured and the lid properly screwed on.
The screw-on lids seem a poor fit for the bottles, and one of them leaked all over a leather purse in which the bottle was being carried, ruining it.
(First world problems, I know).

I contacted Amazon to see about a refund, but the only way they would refund the purchase is if I returned the bottles - which are filled with essential oil blends, and I would have to dump it all out to send the bottles back, or buy another set of bottles and try to transfer the oil over.
For $9 it wasn't worth all that, even with the $5 additional credit they offered, so I had to chalk this up as a loss and a "buyer beware - read the reviews!" So please - read the reviews.
I'm not the only one who had this problem!
(Also, note the number of people who received a discount or received this product for free in exchange for leaving a review).
Based on other reviews, I thought this would be a great product.
I was surprised and disappointed to discover that this shade is truly colorless on my lips, and it doesn't possess any noticeable plumping factor.
Also, other reviewers mentioned that this burns quite a bit and I totally disagree.
There is some level of slight burning but it's very subtle.
I've tried other lip plumpers that work much better, such as the Physician's Formula Plump Potion.
While very sticky, that particular gloss does do what it's advertised to do.
The NYX Pump it Up gloss really isn't worth the money.
Anyway, people looking for long-lasting plumping won't really get results from a lip gloss - that usually requires some sort of collagen injection, and I'm not about to go there.
I'll just have to be satisfied with my less-than-Angelina pout and chalk it up to genetics.

PSA TO ALL CRAVING DIRT: CHECK YOUR IRON LEVELS!!!!!!!
I used to work for Sephora.
This definitely smells like fresh soil.
We never understood why people actually bought it.
Decades later, I found out those with anemia and iron deficiency have cravings to eat or smell dirt.
They also get cravings to eat ice.
Severe anxiety is another symptom and if you drink a lot of caffeine, you are probably low.
Please see a hematologist to get your iron ferritin checked, asap.
